jgame

Class GMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.GObject
      • jgame.GMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObjectHolder, GPaintable

    public class GMessage
extends GObject
    A simple text message in a game.
    Author:
    William Chargin
